I Am Rohan West The

View my Work

My Experience

My time is filled with far more than just a day job. I keep myself busy and active in a multitude of ways...

Electromechanical Repairs

My current role at 'De Soutter Medical' revolves around the Repair and Maintenance of Electromechanical Orthopedic Power Tools from hospitals around the globe.

Youth Rugby Coaching

At 'Aylesbury Rugby Club' I work closely with the u18s squad and the u13s as a coach. Outside of this I also run a 'MasterClass' every month with the club which links the coaching teams of all the junior age groups with senior players for expert advice on a given topic.

Athletic Training

To augment my Rugby Coaching I also play competively, making regular appearences in the Aylesbury 1st team. To enhance my performance I follow a strength training regime inspired by 'Jeff Nippard'.

Self Education

I find great value in always striving to pick up new skills. Most recently I have been learning about Web Development through various online courses, as well as reading books on leadership from authors such as 'Jocko Willink'.
